ValidationRule.description: The add on status can be set back to new once is already worked on only when there is a need of redoing it because something was missing when doing final check, or after the sales agent checked what was missing in please check.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( Status__c ) && TEXT(Status__c )= "New" && TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c )) <> "Please Check" && TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status__c )) <> "Final Check"
